pages.title: Burrows
pages.text: Burrows are holes in the ground, where certain critters live. $(br2)Each burrow can only be inhabited by one single species, albeit multiple individuals may exist in a single burrow. $(br2)Burrows can be disabled in the config file, in which case, Critters will normally spawn in the world

pages.title: Burrows
pages.text: As long as multiple mobs are inside a Burrow, new mobs may rarely be spawned outside of the defined breeding season, thus, it's best to not exhaust burrows. $(br2)Alternatively, destroying a Burrow will delete all Critters inside, and yield a sizeable amount of XP
